message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher for me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $17,000. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
